Class GameInfo

java.lang.Object
ca.group8.gameservice.splendorgame.model.splendormodel.GameInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
public class GameInfo extends Object implements eu.kartoffelquadrat.asyncrestlib.BroadcastContent
The class that contains basic game information on the board, supports long polling.
